maya/beastmayaplugin/src/texturetarget.cpp

#include "texturetarget.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h"

#include <sstream>
#include <algorithm>
#include "mayautils.h"
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>
#include <maya/MImage.h>

namespace beastmaya {

struct BeastTextureResult {
        std::vector<std::wstring> splitTextures;
};

struct PassResult {
        PassPtr pass;
        std::vector<BeastTextureResult> textures;
        PassResult(PassPtr p) : pass(p) { }
};

struct TargetResult {
        std::vector<PassResult> passResults;
};

TextureEntity::TextureEntity(const MObject& instance, const MObject& entity, const std::wstring& uvSet) :
Entity(instance, entity),
m_uvSet(uvSet),
m_sizeType(TextureEntity::SIZE_TYPE_NONE) { }

void TextureEntity::setTexelScale(float scale) {
        m_sizeType = TextureEntity::SIZE_TYPE_SCALE;

        m_texelScale = scale;
}

void TextureEntity::setTextureResolution(int width, int height) {
        m_sizeType = TextureEntity::SIZE_TYPE_RESOLUTION;

        m_textureWidth = width;
        m_textureHeight = height;
}

void TextureEntity::exportEntity(BeastTarget& target) {
        m_targetEntity = target.addInstance(*getBeastInstance());
        m_targetEntity->setBakeUVSet(m_uvSet.c_str());
        if(m_sizeType == TextureEntity::SIZE_TYPE_SCALE) {
                m_targetEntity->setTexelScale(m_texelScale);
        } else if(m_sizeType == TextureEntity::SIZE_TYPE_RESOLUTION) {
                m_targetEntity->setBakeResolution(m_textureWidth, m_textureHeight);
        }
}

void TextureEntity::importEntity(TargetResult& result) {
        MStatus res;

        int32 fIdx;
        float sX,sY, oX, oY;
        m_targetEntity->getAtlasInformation(fIdx, oX, oY, sX, sY);
        MFnDependencyNode entityNode(getMayaEntity(), &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);

        setPlugValue(entityNode, L"outFrameBufferIndex", (int)fIdx);
        setPlugValue(entityNode, L"outAtlasOffset", oX, 0);
        setPlugValue(entityNode, L"outAtlasOffset", oY, 1);
        setPlugValue(entityNode, L"outAtlasScale", sX, 0);
        setPlugValue(entityNode, L"outAtlasScale", sY, 1);

        // Erase compound
        MPlug textureResultsPlug = entityNode.findPlug(L"textureResults", &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);

        unsigned int numElements = textureResultsPlug.numElements();
        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numElements; ++i) {
                std::wstringstream cmd;
                cmd << L"removeMultiInstance " << getEntityName() << L".textureResults[" << i << "];";
                res = MGlobal::executeCommand(cmd.str().c_str());
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        }

        for(unsigned int passIndex = 0; passIndex < result.passResults.size(); ++passIndex) {
                PassResult& passResult = result.passResults[passIndex];
                {
                        // Set pass name
                        std::wstringstream cmd;
                        cmd << L"setAttr -type \"string\" " << getEntityName() << L".textureResults[" << 
                                passIndex << L"].pass \"" << passResult.pass->getPassName() << "\"";
                        res = MGlobal::executeCommand(cmd.str().c_str());
                        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                }
                {
                        // Grab the correct atlas
                        assert(fIdx < int32(passResult.textures.size()) && "frame buffer index larger than number of resulting textures");
                        BeastTextureResult& textureResult = passResult.textures[fIdx];
                        for(unsigned int splitIndex = 0; splitIndex < textureResult.splitTextures.size(); ++splitIndex) {
                                // Set texture filename
                                std::wstringstream cmd;
                                cmd << L"setAttr -type \"string\" " << getEntityName() << L".textureResults[" << 
                                        passIndex << L"].textureFileName[" << splitIndex << "] \"" << textureResult.splitTextures[splitIndex] << "\"";
                                res = MGlobal::executeCommand(cmd.str().c_str());
                                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                        }
                }
        }
}

TextureTarget::TextureTarget(const MObject& targetNode, int width, int height, bool atlas, int padding, bool atlasRescale, float atlasThreshold) :
m_width(width),
m_height(height),
m_atlas(atlas),
m_padding(padding),
m_atlasRescale(atlasRescale),
m_atlasThreshold(atlasThreshold),
Target(targetNode) { }

void TextureTarget::exportTarget(BeastJob& job) {
        static int i = 0;
        std::wostringstream nameStream;
        nameStream << L"target" << i++;
        std::wstring name = nameStream.str();
        if(m_atlas) {
                BeastTargetPtr target = job.createAtlasedTextureTarget(name.c_str(), m_width, m_height, 0, m_atlasRescale, m_atlasThreshold);
                setBeastTarget(target);
                getBeastTarget().setAtlasPadding(m_padding);
        } else {
                BeastTargetPtr target = job.createTextureTarget(name.c_str(), m_width, m_height);
                setBeastTarget(target);
        }
        if(isWorldSpaceFilterEnabled()) {
                for(auto it = begin(getWorldSpaceFilterSettings()); it != end(getWorldSpaceFilterSettings()); ++it) {
                        const FilterSettings& settings = it->second;
                        getBeastTarget().enableWorldSpaceFilter(it->first);
                        getBeastTarget().setWorldSpaceFilterSize(it->first, settings.size);
                        getBeastTarget().setWorldSpaceFilterNormalDeviation(it->first, settings.normalDev);
                }
        }
        
        for(auto it = begin(m_entities); it != end(m_entities); ++it) {
                (*it)->exportEntity(getBeastTarget());
        }

        for(auto passIt = begin(m_passes); passIt != end(m_passes); ++passIt) {
                (*passIt)->exportPass(job, getBeastTarget());
                for(auto entityIt = begin(m_entities); entityIt != end(m_entities); ++entityIt) {
                        // Add entity to pass
                        (*passIt)->addEntity(*(*entityIt)->getBeastTargetEntity());
                }
        }
}

static MString getWorkspaceDirectory() {
        MStatus res;
        MString result = MGlobal::executeCommandStringResult(L"workspace -q -rootDirectory", false, false, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        return result;
}

static void createDirectory(const std::wstring& path) {
        std::wstringstream cmd;
        cmd << L"\
import os\n\
dir = os.path.dirname('" << path << L"')\n\
if not os.path.exists(dir):\n\
        os.makedirs(dir)";
        MStatus res = MGlobal::executePythonCommand(cmd.str().c_str());
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}

void TextureTarget::importTarget() {

        TargetResult result;

        MString workspaceDir = getWorkspaceDirectory();
        std::wstring outputSubDir = L"beast";
        
        int numBuffers = getBeastTarget().getFramebufferCount();

        for (auto pIt = begin(m_passes); pIt!=end(m_passes); ++pIt) {

                BeastRenderPass& rp = (*pIt)->getBeastPass();

                bool skipAlpha = true; // qualify this on a per pass basis

                result.passResults.push_back(PassResult(*pIt));

                for (int i = 0; i < numBuffers; i++) {
                        BeastFramebufferPtr frameBuffer = getBeastTarget().getFrameBuffer(rp, i);

                        int numChannels;
                        frameBuffer->getChannelCount(numChannels);

                        result.passResults.back().textures.push_back(BeastTextureResult());

                        int width, height;
                        frameBuffer->getResolution(width, height);
                        std::vector<unsigned char> pixels;
                        pixels.resize(width*height*numChannels);
                        frameBuffer->readRegionLDR(0,0,width,height, ILB_CS_ALL, 2.2f, pixels);
                        int nofTex = (int)ceilf((float)(numChannels-1)/3.0f);//TODO we don't care about Z, validate this for lua
                        std::vector<std::vector<unsigned char> > outImages; 
                        outImages.resize(nofTex);

                        for (int outIdx=0; outIdx<nofTex; outIdx++) {
                                int size = width*height*4;
                                outImages[outIdx].resize(size);
                        }

                        int offset=0;

                        for(int y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
                                for(int x = 0; x < width; ++x) {
                                        int inputPixel = x + y * width;
                                        int outputPixel = x + (height - y - 1) * width;
                                        int offset = 0;
                                        for (int outIdx=0; outIdx<nofTex; outIdx++) {
                                                outImages[outIdx][outputPixel*4] = pixels[inputPixel*numChannels + offset];
                                                outImages[outIdx][outputPixel*4+1] = (offset + 1 < numChannels) ? pixels[inputPixel*numChannels + offset + 1] : 0;
                                                outImages[outIdx][outputPixel*4+2] = (offset + 2 < numChannels) ? pixels[inputPixel*numChannels + offset + 2] : 0;
                                                outImages[outIdx][outputPixel*4+3] = 255;
                                                offset += 3;
                                        }
                                }
                        }
                        for (int outIdx=0; outIdx<nofTex; outIdx++) {
                                MImage tempI;
                                tempI.create(width, height,4, MImage::kByte);
                                tempI.setPixels(&outImages[outIdx][0], width,height);
                                std::wstringstream tempPath;
                                tempPath << workspaceDir.asWChar() << outputSubDir <<  L"/" << getTargetName() << L"_" << (*pIt)->getPassName();
                                if(m_atlas) {
                                        tempPath << L"_atlas" << i;
                                } else {
                                        // There should only be one entity
                                        tempPath << L"_" << m_entities[0]->getEntityName();
                                }
                                tempPath << L"_" << outIdx << L".tga";
                                createDirectory(tempPath.str());
                                MGlobal::displayInfo(MString(L"BEAST: Writing texture ") + tempPath.str().c_str());
                                tempI.writeToFile(tempPath.str().c_str(), L"tga");

                                result.passResults.back().textures.back().splitTextures.push_back(tempPath.str());
                        }
                }
        }

        for(auto it = begin(m_entities); it != end(m_entities); ++it) {
                (*it)->importEntity(result);
        }

}

void TextureTarget::addEntity(TextureEntityPtr& entity) {
        m_entities.push_back(entity);
}

void TextureTarget::addPass(PassPtr& pass) {
        m_passes.push_back(pass);
}

}
